verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
1. Far above all other loves,
Far beyond all other joys,
Heavens blessings poured on me,
By the Holy Spirit' power.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Love's compelling power
Draws my heart into Yours;
Jesus, how I love You,
You're my friend and my Lord.
You have died and risen
So what else can I say?
How I love You Lord,
Love You, Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
2. All ambition now has gone,
Pleasing You my only goal;
Motivated by Your grace,
Living for eternity.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
3. Looking with the eye of faith
For the day of Your return;
In that day I want to stand
Unashamed before Your throne.
